donate.title: Donate

welcome.title: Pick My Degree
welcome.subtitle: Discover your ideal university degree through a tournament of choices.
welcome.data_source: The list includes all first-cycle and single-cycle (direct full) degree programmes from {politoLink} and {unitoLink}. Second-cycle degrees (Masterâ€™s / Lauree magistrali) are not included, as the app is designed for final-year high school students.
welcome.data_academic_year: The list is updated to the academic year 2025â€“26.

rules.title: How to Play
rules.subtitle: Four steps. One winner. Your ideal degree.
rules.step1_desc: Tap to remove degrees you donâ€™t want. Keep as many favourites as you like.
rules.step2_desc: Two degrees, one choice: pick which to drop. We trim down to a tournament bracket.
rules.step3_desc: Choose the winner of each match. 16 â†’ 8 â†’ 4 â†’ 2 until one champion remains.
rules.step4_desc: Meet your top pick, add your name, and download a shareable result card.

categories.title: By category
categories.instruction: Tap a category to remove it and all its degrees. You can remove whole blocks at once.
categories.keep_at_least: Keep at least one category (2+ degrees) to continue.

phase1.title: Phase 1: Filter
phase1.instruction: Tap the cards to remove degrees you are definitely NOT interested in.

phase2.title: Phase 2: Choose
phase2.instruction: Tap the degree you want to keep. The other is eliminated.
phase2.minimal_note: Only the minimum number of choices to reach the tournament size (power of 2), then direct-elimination bracket.
phase2.timeout_explanation: If you don't choose in time, one candidate is picked at random (we'll show you which one was kept).
phase2.random_toast: Time's up! A random choice was made.
